name: Love Game in Eastern Fantasy
overview: A mischievous girl guides a tsundere, embarking on a journey through challenges to create a new world filled with love. Along the way, they level up by capturing demons and defeating monsters, forming friendships. The grudges between humans and demons finally has a resolution in their quest, serving both as the redemption of love and the salvation of the world!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Pulled into the pages of a fantasy novel, a woman is shocked to find herself stuck in the role of a villain. Now, she must battle to rewrite her destiny.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After being transported to another world and turning into a minor villain, Ling Miao Miao meets Lin Lu Shan, who looks just like her father.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Mu Sheng becomes suspicious of Ling Miao Miao. After Ling Miao Miao figures out how to change Mu Yao's treatment, saving her life, they become friends.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ling Miao Miao helps Mu Yao and Liu Fu Yi, but the system forces her to work toward her task. Meanwhile, Mu Sheng grows increasingly suspicious.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In order to return to the real world, Ling Miao Miao must earn Mu Sheng's trust and find a way to make him happy.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: At the lantern festival, Ling Miao Miao revives childhood memories for Mu Yao. Corruption comes to light when a fire breaks out at a granary.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After resigning, Lin Lu Shan takes up a simpler life thanks to Ling Miao Miao. Mu Sheng keeps watch on Ling Miao Miao, in the hope of exposing her.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Mu Sheng's demonic form is revealed when he is seriously injured, but Ling Miao Miao remains fearless. The Water Demon King escapes unnoticed.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Mu Sheng's feelings for Ling Miao Miao grow, leading to a romantic encounter under the moonlight.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Ling Miao Miao is determined to hone her sorcery skills. The protagonists investigate the Valley of the Lost and uncover Guo Xiu's deception.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: As the protagonists delve deeper into the Valley of the Lost, in an effort to break the spells, their worst fears come to life before them.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Pulled into the pages of a fantasy novel, a woman is shocked to find herself stuck in the role of a villain. Now, she must battle to rewrite her destiny.
